title: BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Philcement Corp Signed Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Construction-In-Progress Assets
text:
BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Philcement Corp Signed Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Construction-In-Progress Assets

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 09:20)

BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Philcement Corp Signed Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Construction-In-Progress Assets Sept 27 (Reuters) - PHINMA Corp :

* PHILCEMENT CORP & SEASIA NECTAR PORT SERVICES SIGNED TERM

SHEET

FOR ACQUISITION BY PHILCEMENT OF CERTAIN

CONSTRUCTION-IN-PROGRESS ASSETS

* DEAL FOR 800 MILLION PESOS IN FORM OF ASSUMPTION BY

PHILCEMENT

OF SEASIA LOAN IN THE SAME PRINCIPAL AMOUNT



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX8MGzRW

Further company coverage: PHN.PS





BRIEF-Phinma Corp Says Philcement Corp Signed Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Construction-In-Progress Assets
